shortDescription: A healthy and easy-to-make avocado toast, perfect for breakfast.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and add lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread.
Sprinkle chili flakes on top for added spice (optional).

shortDescription: Fluffy gluten-free pancakes that are easy to make and delicious.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, and baking powder.
In a separate bowl, whisk the egg, milk, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients and stir until just mixed.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles appear, then flip and cook until golden brown.

shortDescription: A refreshing pasta salad with vegetables and a light dressing.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions and drain.
Mix the pasta, cucumber, and red bell pepper in a large bowl.
Whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper in a separate bowl.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss well.
Top with feta cheese before serving.

shortDescription: Quick and easy chicken stir fry with vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook the chicken until browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

shortDescription: A delicious tofu stir fry with bell peppers and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan and cook tofu until crispy.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 3 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

shortDescription: A homemade vegetarian pizza with fresh vegetables and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Spread marinara sauce on the pizza dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese, vegetables, and olives.
Bake in a preheated oven at 400°F for 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot.

shortDescription: Juicy beef burger with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
instructions: Shape the beef into a patty and cook on a grill for 5-7 minutes per side.
Toast the bun and assemble the burger with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
Add ketchup and mustard to taste.

shortDescription: Rich and fudgy gluten-free brownies made with almond flour.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
